name: Choices: The Game
description: Have you ever wanted to do anything with your life? Spontaneous flight to Japan? Boxing a mummy? Or falling in love with the girl of your dreams?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: Any Memory: 25 MB RAM Graphics: You could play this on a microwave Sound Card: There's no sound :P Additional Notes: How are you?
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or up Processor: Anything Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: If you can open Chrome you can play this Sound Card: Don't turn up the volume, there's nothing Additional Notes: I hope you're doing well
